name: This Date Blows!
description:
It’s date night and all seems to be going well. That is… up until you receive a surprise notification on your phone!

On the date, make sure you’re paying close attention to whatever you’re facing! Try to keep your date happy with your smooth lines, but don’t forget to also keep checking your phone… as you’ll be receiving new notifications from your secret buddy every 10 seconds!

NOTE: Headphones Recommended!

Controls:

  • Space - Look at your phone/or date
  • WASD - Respond
  • Left click - Interact
  • Unplug Computer - Secret black screen ending
  • Your date loves eye contact, make sure to look at her and pay attention to keep her affection!
  • Where you look also changes what sounds you can focus on better!

  • @mooobster - Sprite Art, Main Voice
  • Nancy - Title/Cover Art
  • August - Sprite Art, Goku
  • Faaiz - Legal Consultant, Tumbleweed Enthusiast
